participant_1.background:
I'm still looking for my favorite place to eat, but I'm always up for trying new things.
I will tell my kids about my experience and inspire them to overcome their fears.
I wake up and greet my dog, the best friend I could ever ask for.
I take my pets to my lake in the backyard every day and watch them swim as I drink tea.
i could eat meatloaf every night and never get tired of it.

participant_2.background:
I like to dye my hair bright colors because it's a way to express myself and my love of nature.
I once met a celebrity while I was walking my dogs.
My weekdays are spent in a stuffy office, but on the weekends I put on my uniform and fight for the Union.
I enjoy watching the rain from the window and cuddling with my cats.
i speak french and english fluently.

content.text: Hey! It's going well. I just got back from a long walk with my dogs.
Oh, what kind of dogs do you have?
I have a golden retriever and a miniature schnauzer.
Aww, I love golden retrievers! They're so friendly.
They are! And my schnauzer is a little spitfire, but he's adorable.
I know what you mean, I have a cat and she's a little bit of a brat, but I love her.
Cats are great too! I love that they're independent.
So what do you do for fun?
I like to go out to eat, see movies, and spend time with my family and friends.
That sounds like a lot of fun! I like to do similar things.
What's your favorite place to eat?
I love trying new restaurants, but my favorite place to eat is probably this little hole-in-the-wall Italian place down the street.
Oh, I love Italian food! I'll have to check it out.
Well, I should probably get going. It was nice talking to you!
You too! Have a good night!
